events.comment: Music tracks that are currently defined

On Mac there is a delay between the playing the music on the channel and the "is being played" condition returning true. To work around this, we don't leave the State "playing" unless PlayState is also "playing". So PlayState goes: stopped -> requested -> playing -> stopped

events.name: Gotta enumerate every track because the "Play music" action requires a file

events.comment: This kicks off the PlayState to indicate the loading has finished.
Don't enqueue duplicates, as the music loops anyway.
If the music is to switch, then fade out the current track
Pick betwen vowel/consonant Track and determine Pitch shift
